item.title: Star Wars: Every Rule Of Two Sith In Legends & Canon
item.description: The Rule of Two states that there can only be two Sith Lords at any given time, so how many Sith have adhered to this doctrine in Star Wars?

item.title: 13 Years Ago, Captain Americaâ€™s Origin Perfectly Set-Up The Rise Of 2 Terrifying MCU Villains Coming In 2025
item.description: The arrival of two of the MCU's most terrifying villains in 2025 was perfectly set up by one line in Captain America: The First Avenger in 2011.

item.title: War Of The Rohirrim Continuing Lord Of The Rings' Box Office Streak Is Even More Important Now
item.description: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim's hopes of continuing the franchise's impressive box office streak is more important than ever.
